flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
１おくねんまえから　こおりづけに
なっていた　からだの　いちぶから
ふっかつした　こだいの　ポケモン。

1억 년 전부터 빙하로
뒤덮여 있던 몸의 일부에서
부활한 고대의 포켓몬이다.

Pokémon ancien, ramené à la vie après la découverte
d’une partie de son corps conservée dans la glace
pendant 100 millions d’années.

Dieses antike Pokémon wurde aus Teilen seines
Körpers neu belebt, die 100 Millionen
Jahre lang im ewigen Eis geschlummert hatten.

Pokémon que ha sido regenerado a partir de un trozo
de su antiguo cuerpo, que quedó congelado hace
unos 100 millones de años.

Pokémon preistorico riportato in vita dopo più di
100 milioni di anni grazie a parti del suo corpo
rinvenute nel ghiaccio.

This ancient Pokémon was restored
from part of its body that had been
frozen in ice for over 100 million years.

１億年前から　氷漬けに　なっていた
体の　一部から　復活した
古代の　ポケモン。

おっとりした　せいかくの　ポケモン。
ガチゴラスなど　きょうぼうな　てきの
いない　さむい　とちに　すんでいた。

의젓한 성격의 포켓몬이다.
견고라스 등 흉포한 적이
없는 추운 땅에 살고 있었다.

Ce Pokémon placide vivait dans des contrées
au climat froid, loin de la menace d’un violent
prédateur comme Rexillius.

Dieses eher ruhige Pokémon lebte in einem kalten
Land, in dem es keine brutalen Gegner wie
Monargoras zu fürchten hatte.

Un Pokémon de carácter sosegado. Habitaba en
lugares fríos donde no existían depredadores tan
feroces como Tyrantrum.

Pokémon dal carattere tranquillo.
Abitava in terre fredde, in cui non doveva temere
la presenza di terribili predatori come i Tyrantrum.

This calm Pokémon lived in a cold land where
there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.

おっとりした　性格の　ポケモン。
ガチゴラスなど　凶暴な　敵の　いない
寒い　土地に　住んでいた。

１おくねんまえから　こおりづけに
なっていた　からだの　いちぶから
ふっかつした　こだいの　ポケモン。

1억 년 전부터 빙하로
뒤덮여 있던 몸의 일부에서
부활한 고대의 포켓몬이다.

Pokémon ancien, ramené à la vie après la découverte
d’une partie de son corps conservée dans la glace
pendant 100 millions d’années.

Dieses antike Pokémon wurde aus Teilen seines Körpers
neu belebt, die 100 Millionen Jahre lang im ewigen Eis
geschlummert hatten.

Pokémon que ha sido regenerado a partir de un trozo de
su antiguo cuerpo, que quedó congelado hace unos 100
millones de años.

Pokémon preistorico riportato in vita dopo più di 100 milioni
di anni grazie a parti del suo corpo rinvenute nel ghiaccio.

This ancient Pokémon was restored
from part of its body that had been
frozen in ice for over 100 million years.

１億年前から　氷漬けに　なっていた
体の　一部から　復活した
古代の　ポケモン。

おっとりした　せいかくの　ポケモン。
ガチゴラスなど　きょうぼうな　てきの
いない　さむい　とちに　すんでいた。

의젓한 성격의 포켓몬이다.
견고라스 등 흉포한 적이
없는 추운 땅에 살고 있었다.

Ce Pokémon placide vivait dans des contrées au climat froid,
loin de la menace d’un violent prédateur comme Rexillius.

Dieses eher ruhige Pokémon lebte in einem kalten Land,
in dem es keine brutalen Gegner wie Monargoras zu fürchten
hatte.

Un Pokémon de carácter sosegado. Habitaba en lugares fríos
donde no existían depredadores tan feroces como Tyrantrum.

Pokémon dal carattere tranquillo. Abitava in terre fredde,
in cui non doveva temere la presenza di terribili predatori
come i Tyrantrum.

This calm Pokémon lived in a cold land where
there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.

おっとりした　性格の　ポケモン。
ガチゴラスなど　凶暴な　敵の　いない
寒い　土地に　住んでいた。

こだいの　さむいとちに　すんでいた。
アマルスが　いななくとき　よぞらに
オーロラが　あらわれる　という。

고대에 차가운 토지에서 살았다.
아마루스가 울면 밤하늘에
오로라가 나타난다고 한다.

曾經棲息在古代的寒冷地帶。
據說當冰雪龍發出鳴叫時，
夜空中就會出現極光。

Amagara vivait jadis dans les terres glacées.
On dit que lorsqu’il pousse un cri, une aurore
boréale nimbe le ciel nocturne.

Vor Urzeiten lebte es in kalten Gebieten. Es
heißt, wenn Amarino seine Stimme erklingen
lässt, erscheinen Polarlichter.

Vivía en zonas gélidas en épocas pasadas y,
según dicen, el sonido que emite provoca la
aparición de auroras boreales nocturnas.

In passato abitava nelle terre più fredde.
Si dice che quando emette il suo verso, nel cielo
notturno compaia l’aurora boreale.

It lived in cold areas in ancient times. It’s said
that when Amaura whinnies, auroras appear in
the night sky.

古代の　寒い土地に　棲んでいた。
アマルスが　いななくとき　夜空に
オーロラが　現れる　という。

曾栖息在古代寒冷的土地上。
据说，冰雪龙鸣叫的时候，
夜空中会出现极光。

ふくげんに　せいこうしたが　いまの
かんきょうは　あつすぎて　ながいきは
できないと　かんがえられている。

복원에 성공했지만 오늘날의
환경은 너무 더워서 오래 살지는
못할 것으로 여겨지고 있다.

雖然從化石中復原成功，
但因為現代的環境太熱了，
被認為無法長久生存。

Il a été reconstitué, mais son corps n’est pas
adapté aux températures actuelles, ce qui
affecte probablement son espérance de vie.

Es konnte aus einem Fossil zurückverwandelt
werden, aber seine Lebenserwartung ist niedrig,
da das heutige Klima zu heiß für es ist.

Aunque se ha regenerado con éxito, las cálidas
temperaturas actuales no le son propicias y
afectan a su esperanza de vida.

È stato rigenerato con successo, ma si pensa
che il clima attuale sia troppo caldo e che la sua
speranza di vita non sia molto elevata.

Amaura was restored successfully, but it’s not
expected to live long because of the heat of the
current environment.

復元に　成功したが　今の
環境は　暑過ぎて　長生きは
できないと　考えられている。

虽然复原成功了，
但由于现在的环境过热，
被认为无法长期生存。

かせきから　ふくげんが　せいこう。
てきの　すくない　さむいとちで
むれを　つくり　くらしていた。

화석으로부터 복원에 성공했다.
적이 적은 추운 땅에서
무리 지어 살았다.

從化石復原成功的
寶可夢。曾經群居在
天敵不多的寒冷地區。

Ce Pokémon a été ressuscité à partir d’un fossile.
Jadis, il vivait en meute dans des terres froides,
où peu de ses prédateurs résidaient.

Amarino wurde erfolgreich aus einem Fossil
reanimiert. Einst lebte es gruppenweise in kalten
Gebieten, wo nur wenige Feinde lauerten.

Este Pokémon ha sido regenerado a partir de
un fósil. Habitaba en manadas en lugares fríos
donde los depredadores escaseaban.

È stato rigenerato da un fossile.
Viveva in gruppo in regioni fredde, dove
i predatori scarseggiavano.

This Pokémon was successfully restored from a
fossil. In the past, it lived with others of its kind
in cold lands where there were fewer predators.

化石から　復元が　成功。
敵の　少ない　寒い土地で
群れを　つくり　暮らしていた。

从化石中成功复原。
曾经在没什么天敌的
寒冷地区群居。

ぜつめつした　こだいの　ポケモン。
こおりづけの　じょうたいで
はっけんされることも　あるぞ。

멸종한 고대의 포켓몬이다.
얼어붙은 상태로
발견되기도 한다.

已經滅絕的古代寶可夢。
有時候還會以冰封狀態
被發現喔。

Un Pokémon ancien qui s’est éteint. On trouve
parfois des spécimens conservés dans la glace.

Ein ausgestorbenes Pokémon aus der Urzeit.
Manchmal werden im Eis erhalten gebliebene
Exemplare entdeckt.

Un Pokémon prehistórico extinto. Se han hallado
algunos ejemplares conservados bajo el hielo.

Pokémon dell’antichità ormai estinto. A volte
ne vengono scoperti esemplari conservatisi
all’interno di blocchi di ghiaccio.

Amaura is an ancient Pokémon that has gone
extinct. Specimens of this species can sometimes
be found frozen in ice.

全滅した　古代の　ポケモン。
氷漬けの　状態で
発見されることも　あるぞ。

已经灭绝的古代宝可梦。
有时候它还会以冰封的
状态被发现喔。

ability.effect:
The weather changes to hail when this Pokémon enters battle and does not end unless cancelled by another weather condition.

If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drizzle, drought, or sand stream are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay.
ability.short_effect: Summons hail that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

move.effect:
Transfers 1/4 the user's max HP into a doll that absorbs damage and causes most negative move effects to fail.  If the user leaves the field, the doll will vanish.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

The doll takes damage as normal, using the user's stats and types, and will break when its HP reaches zero.  Self-inflicted damage from confusion or recoil is not absorbed.  Healing effects from opponents ignore the doll and heal the user as normal.  Moves that work based on the user's HP still do so; the doll's HP does not influence any move.

The doll will block major status effects, confusion, and flinching.  The effects of smelling salts and wake up slap do not trigger against a doll, even if the Pokémon behind the doll has the appropriate major status effect.  Multi-turn trapping moves like wrap will hit the doll for their regular damage, but the multi-turn trapping and damage effects will not activate.

Moves blocked or damage absorbed by the doll do not count as hitting the user or inflicting damage for any effects that respond to such, e.g., avalanche, counter, or a rowap berry.  magic coat still works as normal, even against moves the doll would block.  Opposing Pokémon that damage the doll with a leech move like absorb are healed as normal.

It will also block acupressure, block, the curse effect of curse, dream eater, embargo, flatter, gastro acid, grudge, heal block, leech seed, lock on, mean look, mimic, mind reader, nightmare, pain split, psycho shift, spider web, sketch, swagger, switcheroo, trick, worry seed, and yawn.  A Pokémon affected by yawn before summoning the doll will still fall to sleep.

The doll blocks intimidate, but all other abilities act as though the doll did not exist.  If the user has an ability that absorbs moves of a certain type for HP (such as volt absorb absorbing thunder wave), such moves will not be blocked.

life orb and berries that cause confusion still work as normal, but their respective HP loss and confusion are absorbed/blocked by the doll.

The user is still vulnerable to damage inflicted when entering or leaving the field, such as by pursuit or spikes; however, the doll will block the poison effect of toxic spikes.

The doll is passed on by baton pass.  It keeps its existing HP, but uses the replacement Pokémon's stats and types for damage calculation.

All other effects work as normal.
move.short_effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

move.effect:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse's curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom desire and future sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move's protection after it hits
* imprison

move.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's IVs.

Power is given by `x * 40 / 63 + 30`.  `x` is obtained by arranging bit 1 from the IV for each of Special Defense, Special Attack, Speed, Defense, Attack, and HP in that order.  (Bit 1 is 1 if the IV is of the form `4n + 2` or `4n + 3`.  `x` is then 64 * Special Defense IV bit 1, plus 32 * Special Attack IV bit 1, etc.)

Power is always between 30 and 70, inclusive.  Average power is 49.5.

Type is given by `y * 15 / 63`, where `y` is similar to `x` above, except constructed from bit 0.  (Bit 0 is 1 if the IV is odd.)  The result is looked up in the following table.

Value | Type
----: | --------
    0 | fighting
    1 | flying
    2 | poison
    3 | ground
    4 | rock
    5 | bug
    6 | ghost
    7 | steel
    8 | fire
    9 | water
   10 | grass
   11 | electric
   12 | psychic
   13 | ice
   14 | dragon
   15 | dark

This move thus cannot be normal.  Most other types have an equal 1/16 chance to be selected, given random IVs.  However, due to the flooring used here, bug, fighting, and grass appear 5/64 of the time, and dark only 1/64 of the time.
move.short_effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.
